channel.title: Blogs on Batjaa's corner
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Batjaa's corner

item.title: I live in my van
item.description: It’s been a year since I moved into my vanAt first I was little bit shy about my life style. Most of the people who hear it at the first time would raise an eyebrow and ask “What?” with other questions following. Now, I’m more used to that or it became easier since most of the people who I know, know my life style. During the last era of time, the usual norm of work and life has changed a lot.
